Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored the winning goal in the 69th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Mexico were undergoing a rebuild, with veterans like Memo Ochoa, Hector Herrera, and Chucky Lozano seemingly out of the national team picture
Post-Match Reflections: Jaime Lozano's squad lost their captain and star player Edson Alvarez to a hamstring injury just 30 minutes into the match
The El Tri attack was abysmal, with little to no service from wide areas
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a test for Mexico to begin the Copa America 2024 tournament
Mexico won 1-0 against Jamaica, with Gerardo Arteaga's goal being the difference
Others: Mexico's performance won't be enough throughout the tournament if they want to make any sort of run
Jaime Lozano's tactics failed Gimenez, Quinones, and Antuna
